The straps on the top are very unique and very “Free People” looking.  You won’t regret getting this.

I sidestep this by leaving the zipper zipped and just putting it on over my head like a tshirt.

So I'm wearing leggings or shorts underneath it anyways. I absolutely adore this and will be buying it in multiple colors. I bought it a tad big and I'm glad I did! This dress is large for the size listed.  I ordered a medium and could have fit into a small.  It looks fine on and is comfortable.  There is a liner which makes it not see through.  The liner is kind of noisy, but necessary to wear as a dress.  Otherwise, without the liner, it could be used as a beach cover up.

Who doesn't love to harken summer days with a  long lacy sundress? But this one kicks it up with the canvas straps that give it just a bit of a tomboy look. The inner layer is shorter than the dress, so expect the  skirt to be see-through from the thigh down. The model in the photo has paired it with what looks like a matching bra. Don't know where she got that, but it wasn't in the package my wife got. She says she'll wear it with a tank top. It's definitely too small and too loose to go without something under it up top.

I was iffy about this purchase based on product rating and previous reviews, but I decided to give it a try anyways. I'm 5'2, 140lbs and I have a mom belly. I read some reviews that said size up, but last minute I decided not to, and went with a small. I'm glad I ordered the smaller size. It fits great! There is no stretch, but there is a good length zipper in the skirt which makes it easy to get on and off. Once on, it is loose around the stomach area. This makes it extra comfy. It is cute as is or would also be cute with an added belt like another reviewer shows. IT HAS POCKETS!!! The liner in the skirt comes to mid thigh on me, which is perfect for me. It's not too long so it'll be nice and airy to wear this spring and summer. I was hesitant to buy, but so glad I did!

This dress is so cute and comfy but the clasps on the front are a little cheap and could break really easily. The dress itself is really cute and is really comfortable and flows really nicely. I would order a size up.
Dress looks cute but both buckles broke the first time I tried to snap them together. I will have to find someone to fix it before I can wear it
It's really pretty and flowy. Only down side the under skirt doesn't go over my but
This is very very cute and nicely made, reminiscent of the old guinea sack, romantic look. With a little country overall combination. Will be posting a pic as soon as I can get one!

While i'm generally not a fan of non-cotton summer wear, i had a feeling about this and went with it. It's even prettier than i expected. I wore it to work the other day with a little top under and got compliments all day. It seems like it will also be comfy when it's high summer. My only complaint is that the pockets could be just a touch deeper, but pockets it has and they made an effort to allow you to put actual things in them. My cell phone peeks out at the corner, but i can get most of it in there, so that's workable. I really like this dress!

I’ve gotten so many compliments every time I wear this because it is sooo cute. It’s also extremely comfy. The only thing is you can tell quality is a little poorer with the feel of the fabric and the fact the overall buckles have already come apart twice but were fixable. You get what you pay for, but I overall love it. The pockets, the fit, and the look are all amazing.

I like predominately cotton fabric or other natural fibers. I don't tend to do well with most synthetics unless as a cardigan or outerwear. I saw this was listed as cotton and decided it was worth trying.  FABRIC This jumper is NOT mostly cotton. In fact, I would say this fabric is only about 15% cotton at the most. The bib front and back are made of a twill cotton. It is a heavier weight like a lightweight denim. Painters pants are a similar fabric. The straps look like cotton woven belting web with synthetic patterned overlay. Thats it.  The trim, all skirt pieces, and lining are all synthetic probably polyester. There are no content labels in this jumper, but I am very familiar with fabrics.  STYLE Beside the annoyance that this is not much cotton, I will say the style is cute. It looks really nice over a long dress or a top and skirt. Alone it isn't flattering. It has belt loops on the back so you can belt it which looks nice too.  LINING This lining is soft and not stiff or noisy. It does stick to the skin easily in warm conditions. I find that a skirt or under slip is necessary to avoid that. The dress is very see through so if the lining sticks to you, it won't look nice.  FIT I wear a size 14-16 misses US and this in XL fits well. It is baggy eniugh to allow for belting which also looks cute.  ZIPPER The zipper is invisible style which is annoying when it gets caught on the thin skirt fabric. If you are careful, it works okay.  THE BOTTOM LINE This is a cute jumper skirt, but it is not much cotton.  MY RATING THREE STARS. This is nice, but mostly synthetic. It sticks to the skin in hot humid weather and is warm to wear vs natural. Over a dress or skirt and top, this is better than wearing alone.

I love the look but trying it on  the first time the jeans button came off, which can not be reattached has to be replaced. It only has one pocket and the lining good be longer and more flowy material
Very nice summer dress. Light enough that it can be worn with other shirts or shorts underneath it. Love the feeling of the fabric. Overall 10/10 Great value.
